title: Deathvox - 160 Horror Stingers and Jumpscares
description: Deathvox is a high-quality pack of 160 dark stingers/jumpscares, composed for use in horror games.
longDescription:
Deathvox is a high-impact audio pack featuring 160 terror-inducing sound files, meticulously designed to intensify the atmosphere in horror and thriller games. This collection offers 20 hand-crafted jump scares and 50 eerie stingers, blending orchestral and electronic elements to create a versatile and dynamic sound palette. Additionally, the pack includes 90 unique stingers derived from the original 50, using experimental post-processing techniques to produce fresh, unpredictable variations. Some retain the essence of the original sound, while others are twisted and mangled into something entirely unrecognizable. Perfect for building tension, delivering shock moments, and enhancing atmospheric dread, Deathvox is an essential toolkit for game developers aiming to immerse players in a world of fear and suspense.


Sound Demo


Audio Quality:

Deathvox was created with industry-leading software used in professional studios worldwide, each track delivers a polished, high-quality sound, elevating your game to new heights of immersion.


Technical Details: 

  • 160 Stereo WAV audio files (24-bit/48kHz)
  • Bit rate: 2304 kbps
  • 298MB uncompressed
  • Royalty-Free license


**If you'd like to learn more about Andrew or his ongoing projects, visit andrewchamberscomposer.com
technicalDetails:
